title: T206 red/bat off Cobbs!  Many backs/varied condition
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: T206 red/bat off Cobbs!  Many backs/varied condition
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell several T206 Cobbs to finance something else for my collection.  Prices are for a no fee method and include shipping.  Happy to consider reasonable offers.

Reds:
Piedmont 350 PSA 5 - $15k
Polar Bear PSA 2 - $6800
Old Mill PSA 1.5 - $5000
Sovereign 350 PSA 2 - $8000

Bat offs:
Polar Bear SGC 20 (stained) - $4500
Tolstoi PSA 1.5 - $9000
What can you do on your epdg cy young
